main_definition: based on the evidence or facts known at the time; as far as one knows.

meanings_and_examples.definition: seeming to be true based on what is known, but not necessarily proven.
meanings_and_examples.example: Apparently, he's been working late every night this week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to the extent that one can tell from observation or evidence; seemingly so.
meanings_and_examples.example: She apparently finished her homework before going out with friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: as it seems to be true, without having definite proof.
meanings_and_examples.example: Apparently, the company is planning a major restructuring next month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to a certain extent or degree; seemingly
meanings_and_examples.example: The room was apparently quite messy after the party.
